application.doc: Exporting an HTTP Transformation Rule file template

param.name: http_transformation_rule_template_identifier
param.doc: Specify to retrieve the request or response template. Valid values are "http_transformation_rules_request_template" and "http_transformation_rules_response_template".

param.name: export
param.doc: An indication that this operation is to retrieve the entire file not just a snippet. This parameter is required

method.name: GET
method.id: Exporting an HTTP Transformation Rule file template
method.doc: To export the HTTP Transformation Rule file template with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command and include the export parameter on the HTTP Transformation Rule file resource URI. The export parameter is what differentiates the retrieve operation and the export operation. If the export parameter is included in the URL, the entire file is exported. If no export parameter is included in the URL, a snippet of the file is retrieved.

request.doc:
Retrieve the request template
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/wga_templates/http_transformation_rules_request_template
Retrieve the response template
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/wga_templates/http_transformation_response_request_template
Retrieve the request template
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/wga_templates/http_transformation_rules_request_template?export
Retrieve the response template
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/wga_templates/http_transformation_response_request_template?export
